title: Xerath's E gets blocked by Velkoz's W's second rupture
body:
Problem Description:
If Xerath's E crosses Velkoz's W during its second damage animation, Xerath's E completely disappears and does damage to the ground (where the abilities crossed). It's almost as if Yasuo's Windwall was blocking it. It only occurs if it is over the hitbox of Velkoz's W as the second rupture is happening. If done afterwards it works normally. Note: I was playing ARAM as Xerath when this occurred and am unsure if this is true on SR. I was able to reproduce the bug a couple of times to make sure I wasn't crazy or hitting a minion.

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Log in
2. Load up a match with Xerath and Velkoz on opposite teams
3. After Velkoz uses his W. As Xerath cast your E before the second rupture occurs. Important to know the timing.

Side Note:
Can confirm this bug occurs with Brand's Q as well. I believe since they are of the same skillshot type it may be related. Not sure if all projectiles work that way with this bug or not.

replies.body: This should be fixed for next patch, if not the one after. ;)
